titles.title: Savings for Servicemembers Act
Savings for Servicemembers Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to decrease the distance away from home required for a member of a reserve component of the Armed Forces to be eligible for the above-the-line deduction for travel expenses.
Savings for Servicemembers Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Savings for Servicemembers Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce from 100 miles to 50 miles the distance from home requirement for the tax deduction for the travel expenses of a member of a reserve component of the Armed Forces.
